name: Foldable Treadmill with 10% Incline, Upgrade 3.5HP Low Noise Walking Pad Treadmill with Handle Bar, Trisomy 4 in 1 Portable Under Desk Treadmills for Home/Office, 350Lbs Capacity, APP & Remote Control
short_description: Ultra-Clear Transparent LED Display: The LED display features an innovative transparent shell design for a modern, stylish look, delivering ultra-clear visibility of workout metrics—including speed, calories, time and distance, so you can track your progress effortlessly. The advanced transparent casing enhances brightness while reducing glare, ensuring comfortable viewing even in low-light conditions, ideal for late-night or early-morning runs.

3.5HP Quiet Motor: Walking pad with incline effortlessly supports speeds up to 6 MPH and 350+ lbs while delivering smooth, quiet runs under 40 dB even at maximum speeds. Perfect for home workouts and work-from-home professionals - walk quietly during video calls without disturbing colleagues or family members.

Space-Saving Design: At just 47 lbs(21KG) with smooth wheels, this ultra-compact treadmill folds to 4.43" tall for easy storage under sofa, desk, bed or against walls—perfect for small apartments and dorms.

Enhanced All-in-One Treadmill: This 4-in-1 walking pad treadmill combines a walking pad, folding treadmill, desk treadmill, and hill climber. Fold the handle for under-desk walking and jogging (0.6-4mph), or raise it for climbing and running (0.6-6mph).

Shock Absorption & Extra-Wide Running Belt: This space-saving treadmills for home features a generous 36"x15" running surface with a 6-layer anti-slip belt, supported by 4 shock cushions that reduce impact by 30% versus standard treadmills. The advanced cushioning system protects knees, ankles and hips - ideal for joint-conscious users - while providing tall runners and power walkers ample space for natural, comfortable strides.

Smart Control: Fitness app track key metrics - speed, calories, time, and distance - while letting you customize workouts and connect socially. Easily adjust speed anytime with the included remote for seamless workouts.

Easy to install: With 95% pre-assembled, simply unbox and start your workout immediately. Your walking pad treadmill with incline also comes fully equipped with phone holder, safety key, tools, and manual for hassle-free setup.
